snippet.title: Timberborn Demo is now available!
snippet.description:
🌵 Find the free Timberborn demo at https://store.steampowered.com/app/1062090/Timberborn/ and
https://www.gog.com/game/timberborn_demo!

👉 Remember to wishlist so that you don't miss the Early Access launch:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1062090/Timberborn/
https://www.gog.com/game/timberborn
https://www.epicgames.com/store/en-US/p/timberborn

-- About Timberborn --
Humans are gone. Will your society of lumberpunk beavers do any better? Timberborn is a city-building game featuring ingenious animals, vertical architecture, river control, and deadly droughts. Releases in Steam Early Access, Epic Games Store Early Access, and GOG Games in Development in 2021 on PC and Mac.

The game will be available in English, Polish, Spanish, Brazilian Portuguese, German, French, Russian, Italian, Simplified Chinese, Korean, and Japanese – check the Steam page linked above for a translated description!

-- Features --
🦦 Unique beaver factions*
💦 Wet and dry seasons
🧨 River control with dams and dynamite
🪓 Timber-tech machinery
🏡 Vertical settlements
⛰️ Destructible terrain
🌇 Day and night cycle
🥕 Wellbeing mechanics
🗾 Map editor
...and more!
(*) Yeah, we know, that emoji depicts an otter.

-- Find us on: --
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1062090/Timberborn/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Timberborn
Official Discord server: http://discord.gg/timberborn
For media & content creators: https://timberborn.mechanistry.com/press
